extension_description.message: Displays your daily usage of bandwidth consumption from the provider ElectronicBox.

error_general_description.message: Please check your client code or VL number. You can contact ElectronicBox to get it.

options_profile_vlcode_help.message: Your client code or VL number provided by ElectronicBox.

options_profile_show_on_update_help.message: You can display this page after every update of your browser to review your settings.

options_verifications_startup_enabled_he.message: You can enable a verification to automatically update the informations of your bandwidth consumption when you launch your browser.

options_verifications_periodic_enabled_h.message: You can enable the periodic verifications to automatically update the informations of your bandwidth consumption.

options_verifications_periodic_help.message: Indicate the frequency of the verifications.

options_verifications_periodic_period_ev.message: Three times a day (midnight, morning, evening)

options_notifications_desktop_enabled_he.message: You can receive notifications about your bandwidth consumption on your desktop when your browser is not displayed.

options_notifications_email_enabled_help.message: You can receive notifications about your bandwidth consumption by email (Uses Mandrill service).

options_notifications_rules_all_help.message: A notification will be sent on every verification according to the schedule that you will have set.

options_notifications_rules_presets_help.message: A notification will be sent only when all conditions of a selected rule are met after a verification.

options_notifications_rules_customs_help.message: A notification will be sent only when all conditions of a custom rule are met after a verification.

options_alert_success_message.message: Your settings have been successfully saved.

options_alert_warning_message.message: Your settings have been changed, but were not saved yet.

options_alert_error_message.message: An error occurred while saving your settings.

support_content.message: Some explications about the functioning of the extension.

support_progress_success_description.message: Your consumption is below the available regular consumption.

support_progress_warning_title.message: Watch out for the next few days

support_progress_warning_description.message: Your consumption is over the available regular consumption, but still below the monthly limit.

support_progress_danger_title.message: Reduce your consumption as mush as possible

support_progress_danger_description.message: Your current or projected consumption is over the monthly limit.

about_content.message:
This extension allows clients from ElectronicBox to monitor their bandwidth consumption directly from Google Chrome.
            You will need your client code or your VL code, both provided by ElectronicBox.
            This is an unofficial extension made by a fan, therefore the data might not be accurate even if it is coming directly from the provider ElectronicBox (http://www.ebox.ca).

about_changelog_version_0_1_1.message:
- Bug fix: some parsing in english was incorrect
            - Bug fix: some values needed to be cast in float

about_changelog_version_0_2_0.message:
- Complete rewrite of the extension with AngularJS
            - Added a section to manage settings
            - Added automatic verifications
            - Added desktop notifications

about_changelog_version_0_2_1.message:
- Bug fix: Changed background page to be persistent
            - Bug fix: Added link to the settings page and fixed styling in the popup

about_changelog_version_0_2_2.message:
- Added fields "number of remaining days" and "current month"
            - Added a comment about the current consumption state
            - Added tooltips to the progress bar in the popup
            - Added a  color coded badge according to the current consumption state
            - Bug fix: Some translations and typos

about_changelog_version_0_2_3.message: - Bug fix: Reset of verification count on extension update

about_changelog_version_0_2_4.message: - Bug fix: Update fields "number of days remaining" and "current month" when popup is opened

about_changelog_version_0_2_5.message:
- Bug fix: Prevent multiple animations to be stacked on the action button
            - Bug fix: Update number of verifications when popup is opened

about_changelog_version_0_2_6.message: - Bug fix: Changed the url to fit the new format from Electronic Box

about_changelog_version_0_2_7.message: - Bug fix: Changed the url to fit the new format from Electronic Box in the popup

about_changelog_version_0_2_8.message:
- Added an option to display (or not) the options page on every browser updates
          - Reviewed how the progress bars are calculated
          - Categorization of the bandwidth consumption (under, low, medium, high, over)
          - Bug fix: Added the current day in the total of remaining days, which affects the other calculations

about_changelog_version_0_2_9.message: - Bug fix: Meaningful text for tooltips on the progress bars

about_changelog_version_0_2_10.message: - Modifications to the requests for crawling the data after the changes made by ElectronicBox

about_changelog_version_0_2_11.message: - Bug fix: Detection of PEAK option. (Keven Lefebvre)

about_changelog_version_0_2_12.message: - Modifications to the requests after domain name change from ElectronicBox (http://www.ebox.ca)

popup_notice_status_limit_description.message: ElectronicBox enforces a restriction of 5 requests per hours.

popup_notice_status_error_description.message: Check your client code and the status of ElectronicBox web site.

popup_notice_status_maintenance_descript.message: ElectronicBox appears to be doing maintenance on their web site.

popup_notice_verify_vlcode.message: Make sure your client code or VL code is valid.

popup_notice_progress_under_label.message: Your reduced daily consumption allowed you to accumulate a surplus.

popup_notice_progress_low_label.message: Your moderate daily consumption is slightly above the normal use of your plan.

popup_notice_progress_medium_label.message: Watch your daily consumption, because it exceeds the normal use of your plan.

popup_notice_progress_high_label.message: Moderate your daily consumption, because you may exceed the monthly limit at this rate.

popup_notice_progress_over_label.message: Votre consommation dépasse la limite mensuelle allouée par votre forfait. Considérez l'ajout d'un bloc de consommation pour réduire les éventuels frais supplémentaires.

popup_notice_progress_part2.message:
Projected consumption
for the remainder of the month

details_plan_description.message: The type of plan you use.

details_extra_description.message: The number of additional blocks added to your plan in order to increase your bandwidth limit.

details_total_description.message: The total of available bandwidth in your plan for this month.

details_available_description.message: The quantity of available bandwidth this month.

details_consumed_description.message: The quantity of consumed bandwidth this month.

details_normal_usage_description.message: The projected quantity of bandwidth for the date and a regular daily consumption.

details_current_usage_description.message: The projected quantity of bandwidth for the date and the current daily consumption.

details_normal_daily_usage_description.message: The average quantity of bandwidth for a regular daily consumption.

details_current_daily_usage_description.message: The average quantity of bandwidth for the current daily consumption.

details_remaining_daily_usage_descriptio.message: The average quantity of bandwidth suggested for a regular daily consumption till the end of the month.
